pattern.name: Frequency
pattern.description: Relative frequency of the given nominal value in the population.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: WITH intermediate AS ( SELECT count(*) row_count FROM @propagatedTable ) SELECT t1.@baseId , t1.@baseDate , t1.@baseTarget , 1.0 * count(t1.@baseId) over (partition by t1.@nominalColumn)/t2.row_count AS "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable t1, intermediate t2
